# Slick's Slices

Slick's Slices is website for a local pizza.

## Technologies
 - Multiple Data Types
 - Custom Fields
 - Progressive Images
 - Relational Data
 - Scoped CSS
 - Sourcing Data from a REST API
 - Sourcing Data from a CMS
 - Tags + Filtering
 - Reusable Components
 - Dynamically Generated pages
 - Pagination
 - Dynamic Order Form
 - Client side Fetching
 - Cross Page State Management
 - SEO + Meta Tags
 - Emailing of Order
 - Building
 - Deployment & Hosting
 
## How to start
 - npm install
 - npm run start
 - open project on `localhost`

## Remove Gatsby generated files after develop
 - npm run clean

###### The project is based on this Gatsby [course](https://mastergatsby.com)
